awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 29 wins & 207 nominations.
plot: Alicia Florrick is the wife of a former state&#39;s attorney for Cook County. He has been imprisoned after a sex and corruption scandal. Alicia must deal with the public humiliation. She must also fend for her two children. After years of being a housewife and mother, she returns to work as a litigator at the law firm Stern, Lockhart & Gardner. She must now prove herself in the courtroom.
title: The Good Wife
synopsis: In this courtroom drama, attorney Alicia Florrick finds herself forced to return to work after a scandal lands her politician husband in prison.
